answers.author: Roderick Wood
answers.text:
The City of Riverside, California was pursuing automation of this function about a year ago.  they may have some information for you.


The City of Riverside, California was pursuing automation of this function about a year ago.  they may have some information for you.

author: Bernadette Hughes
text:
Has your municipality automated its lien search process?  Can you tell me the process your municipality went through and what the outcome was?  We'd also like to know how this automation dealt with rentals, how it affected FTE hours, and/or if it required an ordinance revision.  Thanks in advance for any insight on this topic.
Bernadette Hughes
Management Analyst II
City of Tamarac, FL
title: Lien Search Automation
